info.title: Global Food Book API
info.description:
An API used to access content and formats from globalfoodbook's wordpress database. The Global Food Book API provides a programmatic access to content, formats and meta data from the wordpress database. With this REST API, developers can include data from Global Food Book in apps or websites.

Features include
* Recipes, Detailed description, Nutrition label info, Videos, Images and Meta data 
* Blog Posts 
Detailed description of the health related topics. 
* Quotes
*Snippets of motivating food related quotes.
* Products 
*Description of products mostly cooking utensils and recipe ingrdient. 
* Sitemap
*Collection of all the content and formats.
* Site settings 
*Holds all the site settings, navigational and meta data etc. 
* Taxonomies
*This holds data on categories and terms that posts are tagged.
* Podcasts
*This contains podcasts description and audio file location or url.

All endpoints are are located at `api.globalfoodbook.net/v1/`.

ids.name: ids
ids.description: Comma seperated list of post ids (i.e integers post ids seperated by commas)

format.name: format
format.description: The name of the post type or format

tag.name: tag
tag.description: The name of the category or term belonging to a taxonomy

term.name: term
term.description: The name of the term belonging to a taxonomy

slug-or-id.name: slug-or-id
slug-or-id.description: This is the post slug or id.

collection.name: collection
collection.description: This is grouping term that can be taxonomies, posts etc. It is used to narrow down datasets.

date_component.name: date_component
date_component.description: This can be year, month or day.

year.name: year
year.description: This is the year the post was published.

month.name: month
month.description: This is the month the post was published.

recipe_rate_data.name: recipe_rate_data
recipe_rate_data.description: This is the recipe rate request body.

get.description: This status endpoint returns status of this API.
The authors endpoint returns a list of all authors.

get.summary: List of all posts belonging to an author
get.description: The author posts endpoint returns a list of all posts belonging to an author.

200.description: An array of author and their respective posts.

get.description:
The archive endpoint returns a list of the posts by period format
(i.e can be day or month or year).
The archive endpoint returns a list of the posts filtered by year and month.
The archive endpoint returns a list of the posts filtered by year.
The taxonomies endpoint returns a list of all taxonomies.

get.summary: List of all taxonomies with associated taxonomy terms and all associated posts.
get.description: The taxonomies endpoint returns a list of aall taxonomies with associated taxonomy terms and all associated posts.
The taxonomies endpoint returns a list of the tags by parent taxonomy.
The taxonomies terms endpoint returns a list of the posts by parent term.
The Formats endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) most recent posts (i.e can be posts, recipes, podcasts and quotes etc). Pagination is available with the page query attribute.

get.summary: Posts by list of post ids
get.description: The posts endpoint returns a list of the posts by posts ids.

get.summary: Posts by format index returns the recent (i.e recipes, podcasts, posts, products, quotes etc)
get.description: The formats endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) posts by format index. Pagination is available with the page query attribute.
The blog posts endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) most recent blog posts. Pagination is available with the page query attribute.
The recipes endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) most recent recipes. Pagination is available with the page query attribute.
The podcasts endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) most recent podcasts. Pagination is available with the page query attribute.
The products endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) most recent products. Pagination is available with the page query attribute.
The quotes endpoint returns a list of the ten (i.e 10) most recent quotes. Pagination is available with the page query attribute.
The post endpoint returns a posts by slug or id. If post not found a list of possible related posts is returned.

200.description: A post or array of posts.

post.description: This an endpoint that creates/updates a recipe's rate as provided by the user.

200.description: An data about the recipe ratings.

get.description: The formats endpoint returns a posts found by taxonomy.

get.summary: Find formats by taxonomy and term
get.description: The formats endpoint returns a posts found by taxonomy and term.
The settings endpoint returns a list of website settings like menu list, theme widgets, social media links etc etc.
The sitemap endpoint returns a list of website sitemap like menu list, theme widgets, social media links etc etc.

sitemapindex.description: This sitemap index that holds the list of sitemaps.

get.summary: Sitemap url set by taxonomy and term.
get.description: The sitemap urlset endpoint returns a list of urls by taxonomy and term.

urlset.description: This url set index that holds the list of url sets.

get.description: The search endpoint returns a list of posts by term.
